reviews.review: Amazing. Thrill ride from start to finish.

It's really difficult to give an in depth review without giving away spoilers for this movie.  Overflowing with action, excellent special effects and cgi, all I can say is I really want to see it again.
The only negative to the Avengers saga, in my opinion, is that there seems to be just too many superhero's to keep track of.  There a a couple that I still don't know their names.
Plus, Infinity Wars does end leaving a HUGE cliffhanger that leaves us all foaming at the mouth for the next one.
Grab the popcorn, get a soda and settle in for a rocking 2 1/2 hours that will leave you speechless.
Infinity War is as amazing as we all hoped for :)
This film Blew my MIND INTO PIECES, I FELT EXCITED, SAD AND MOST IMPORTANTLY....SHOCKED!!!

Considering the task the Russo brothers faced,this was a near perfect movie,an incredible juggling act with well timed humour and powerful emotional beats.Thanos is the best villain since Heath Ledgers joker and easily the best in the MCU.

One of the best movies I've ever seen, everything you thought was going to happen had a completely different outcome. Very refreshing when movies these days are so predictable and this one kept you on your toes. Plan on going to see it a second time which is says something because I don't usually watch films again until they come out on blu-ray. Please go see this!!
i thought it would be hard to top Civil War with so much story, but once again, Marvel kills it and put out an incredible movie. Please DC, start taking notes.

It was such an amazing movie! Truely a Marvel. The story was great the chracters were great and of course thanos was great. Marvel did a amzaing job at keeping spoilers with their trailer by editing out some parts ir editing special things in. The movie contained sone MAJOR plot twists and reveals. A sat the intire 2/5 ours at the edge of my seat. The soundtracj was one to never forget. I listen to it almost every day while working. If you consider going yo this movie. I definately recommend it. Its great for Marvel fans and even DC fans are going to like it.
A pulse pounding super hero film, with all the rollercoaster of emotions that you would expect from a film like this.
Good movie but ... not a movie I want to see again!
